metadata.synopsis: Three people are nerding out about the Steel Watchers. They have an unofficial fanclub in which they meet to discuss them - one was just thrown by a Watcher (for climbing up on it), and they're all jealous. This is the human's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 3; 49; 133- To the the human nerd

0.speaker: Slozy Arminifer
0.text: Should you wish to join us, learn the difference between gyronetic series four versus seven, yes?

1.speaker: Slozy Arminifer
1.text: Excuse me, we're discussing Steel Watcher gyronetics - a topic beyond your understanding, I imagine.
